thread.title_full: The 5:00 News - Wednesday Shooting, Duke's Mayo Bowl Recap, and More - Chapelboro.com

author: Andrew Stuckey
title: The 5:00 News - Wednesday Shooting, Duke's Mayo Bowl Recap, and More - Chapelboro.com
text: 97.9 The Hill’s Andrew Stuckey presents the afternoon news. Included in this edition of the news, we learn about a shooting that near Jones Ferry Road on Wednesday that left one person dead. We also hear a Media Hub story on how North Carolina’s new abortion law is effecting OB/GYNs. We also hear a recap of UNC’s loss to West Virginia in the Duke’s Mayo Bowl, and more. 97.9 The Hill WCHL and Chapelboro.com are your headquarters for local news in Chapel Hill-Carrboro. Every weekday afternoon, 97.9 The Hill’s Andrew Stuckey recaps the day’s news, from local government to business developments to UNC sports. [Find all of Andrew’s 5:00 News Reports by clicking here.](https://chapelboro.com/category/the-aaron-keck-show/the-5-news) Podcast: [Play in new window](https://media.blubrry.com/sports_notebook/chapelboroaudio.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/2023/12%20-%20December/28/5%20o%27clock%20news%20122823.mp3) | [Download](https://media.blubrry.com/sports_notebook/chapelboroaudio.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/2023/12%20-%20December/28/5%20o%27clock%20news%20122823.mp3) Subscribe: [RSS](https://chapelboro.com/category/news-on-the-hill-with-andrew-stuckey/the-5-news/feed)
